text: @rsprasad @narendramodi @PMOIndia @MoHFW_INDIA @DDNewslive @HMOIndia @BJP4India @BJP4Bihar Great job by India Sir. However, Number 1 on the list should be China for sure, no one knows about them, how its possible that they managed to control  being the producer of coronavirus, this suspense would never get reveal.
